name: Karmic Dungeon
description:
Karmic Dungeon

A dungeon-crawler where you're reborn as the monsters you kill. 

------
NOTE: WebGL build has some performance issues. If you can, playing the PC build is preferable as there will be less lag.

Can you escape from Reincarnation Hell? Battle your way through hordes of monsters as you progress through the dungeon's floors. The only way to become strong enough to defeat them...is to become one of them. 

Controls:
WASD for movement

Spacebar for attack

Any key to progress dialogue.

Any feedback about the game or your experience is welcome! Just post about it in the comments.
